stories.title: Search for a City
stories.description: As a user, I want to search for a city by name so that I can view its weather.

stories.title: View Current Weather
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the current temperature and conditions so that I know what to wear.

stories.title: View Weather Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to see humidity and wind speed so that I can plan my activities.

stories.title: View 5-Day Forecast
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a 5-day forecast so that I can plan for the week.

stories.title: See Weather Icons
stories.description: As a user, I want to see weather icons so that I can quickly understand conditions.

stories.title: Toggle Temperature Units
stories.description: As a user, I want to toggle between Celsius and Fahrenheit so that I can use my preferred unit.

stories.title: Save Favorite Locations
stories.description: As a user, I want to save favorite locations so that I can quickly access their weather.

stories.title: View Saved Favorites
stories.description: As a user, I want to view my saved favorite locations so that I can check their weather easily.

summary: A weather dashboard providing current conditions and a 5-day forecast with core features including search, detailed metrics, visual icons, unit conversion, and favorite location management.
